content.detailedDescription: My wife saw it as she was pulling into the drivewaay i grabbed my binoculars,it appeared as a fireball but then it was sideways for a second resembled a squid like a fireball with tentacles,just happened a minute ago then it dimmed out but uts cloudly tonight,it was near teh airport but wasnt a plane or copter.It appeared to have long fierylike arms with a fire round body,like a flying firesquid ,my whole family seen it.Me my wife and my 13yr old son,tonight.I have seen ufo,s 3 times now i reported to you once before,in saw a aircraft  of the alein or future technology,off of clearveiw rd in morristown,tn 37814 15 yuears ago.It was definately a quiet running bluelighted warp speed ship of some sort.
content.summary: Looked like a fire squid traveling towards our direction then slowly dimmed

content.detailedDescription: I went outside and looked to the south and saw what i thought was a falling star but it was burning red and orange and getting brighter and looked like it was getting closer to the ground i called my brother to look as he was in the house we both ran out and saw the object split into 4 firey balls then it appeared they stopped falling and joined together then disappeared
content.summary: Firey object falling from the sky south of westminster, colorado.

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of saturday 11/07/09, as we celebrated my son's 18th b-day at our home, my son said he was leaving with 2 of his friends to go camping. he came back to the door and called me outside so i can see what he was looking at in the sky. there on the horizon, to the east, was a big light. it at first glance appeared to be a big fire ball, but was not leaving a trail, as we continued to watch this light we noticed radiating lights, it was constantly changing into red, blue, yellow, green colors. it seemed to be going south and then veered to the east and it was as big as probably 3 x the size of a commercial plane. even tough i couldn't see it's shape because it was dark,  i did not think it was a plane because was not making any noise nor did it have little blinking lights like a plane has. believe me, i have seen plenty of planes and you could see a plane in the distance and this light was not off any plane. this light was visible for some time because my son had time to run back to the door to call me outside, i then ran back threw the house to the back door and called my husband to come outside to the front of the house to see the light and then i ran back in and grabbed the camera off the table and we watched the light for about a minute or two. my husband was in the usaf and he could tell me if this was an airplane or not. he was amazed and told me it was not a plane. we had a house full of relatives who also witnessed it but they said if anything it was an airplane on fire? but not an ufo. like i mentioned, i was standing in the front of my house, so i went into the house and got my camera. because i was shaking, i gave the camera to my husband so he recorded for about a minute, but it wasn't as bright as it was in the begining but you can still see it and the color changes. the light continued traveling south east and then it just disappeared!
content.summary: Bright light, not far in the distance that changed colors and looked like a ball of light

content.detailedDescription: It may have been an ufo or maybe a big plane that was reflecting off the sun and then when the sun was no longer hitting it, thus looks like it dissapears.  not sure!  it was white like a star and going a bit faster than a regular plane and no flashing lights like a cessna or something.  it traveled a bit thru the sky then dissapears when the 4 regular airplanes were about to intersect.  two planes from left and two from right and at the intersection point the object dissapears.  i find myself doubting that it was an ufo, but may have been.  not sure, i would like an explanation though.  there have been other nights when i see what i think is a star until it moves around in the same general location...Could be a satelite moving or something...But that was other nights.  tonight im pretty sure it was something!!  there were no clouds in the sky so this object couldnt have dissapeared behind clouds.
content.summary: Weird object like star flew and dissapeared, then 4 planes came thru around cassiopea, not a shooting star was not fast enough

content.detailedDescription: While filling car at gas station on broadview rd., north of brookpark rd a spherical red orange object passed overhead.  the gas station manager saw it, a pilot and another witness. the object was coming from the north and heading southwest.  a few minutes later a second object passed overhead.  they looked like they were on fire.
content.summary: Red orange balls looked like they were on fire

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way back from bible study comming down walnut hill going east when i noticed a bright light in the sky. i knew it could not have been venus or the evening start because it was just too bright. at the time we were living in a condo at trinity meadows on 9696 walnut street. when i got to the apartment i ran upstairs and grabbed my camera and started filming. i was standing behind a fence that separated the condos from the soccer field behind richland community college. the film is a little shaky and grainy at first (until i swithced to night vision). i tried to get shots of the backround for reference. i even filmed several planes flying by it. it was perfectly round adn appeared to be changing colors. i believe i filmed for atleast an 45 mins. i even asked a couple of other people out if they could see it and explain it. you'll hear. i also saw it the nigt before but dismissed it and didn't think anything of it. but it did not return after i filmed it. i checked every night for a week. so of the shots are so clear that i believe you can actually see it 'spinning'. i called my condo and got the time...Quit filming....Went in to get something to eat when i came back outside i continued filming but it had moved 'north' a bit and seemed to be lower on the horizon. it gets shaky towards the end but you can see it 'drift' or 'float' behind a light post as it seems to grow dimmer and it doesn't come out the other side??I filmed for a bit longer but it never showed up.....I didn't report it to anyone but did let some close friends and 'professional' people see it too adn they could not identify or explain the light i filmed....Which was silent. you can clearly hear when another plane flys by...But this thing didn't make a sound. the date and the time are approximate....It has been a long time.
content.summary: I filmed a very bright light in the sky at night after 9:30pm back in october of 2002 or 2003

content.detailedDescription:
I live in a condo on a bay called maul lake, two days prior to the sighting there was a large white light shining up from the water like a spot light the center of the light would have been about 4-5 feet in diameter. two days later there appeared in the water seemingly from nowhere five "beings" sort of potatoe shaped standing on top of the water or so it seemed i was about 150-200 feet from them by our pool, it was a clear calm night, after about 12-13 minutes a helicopter came to the east about 300 feet away flying about 100 feet above the houses there at a very high rate of speed with a very intense spot light shining down directly under itself, it circled twice and flew off, this took about 2 minutes, after this the sighting just faded away. i have seen lights in the water over the years but noting like this. you can call me but only monday - friday 11am - 5pm i don't want to upset my  wife. this is something i really saw, i didn't know who to contact so i contacted ufoarea777 they gave me your name. 
scott rose, please contact me. thank you
content.summary: About 15 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: I came to the stop sign a the end of a road and in front of me on the opposite side of the road there is an open field several acres long which gave me a clear view of the horizon.  it was almost completely dark outside and off in the horizon i saw 2 bright orange globe shaped objects which were rather large in size considering how far away they were, and yes i've seen lots of planes in the sky and it looked a lot bigger than even the largest planes would appear from this far away.  i sat there in my car just watching these objects floating stationary in the same place for about 3 minutes until the light given off from them started to fade and they disappeared.
content.summary: Bright orange globe in the horizon

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were looking at the night sky at what we thought was a ufo, but it was just a planet.  then this bright light came flying across the sky it was not blinking and moving at a good rate, it stayed in our view for a few min until it turned red and vanished almost instantly into thin air, not a cloud in sight!
content.summary: Bright non-blinking light moving fast then turning red and vanishing

content.detailedDescription:
Last night while watching television at 8pm i decided to go out to look at the stars for awhile. looking at the stars on clear nights is something i do regularly when it's warm.  the sky last night was very clear and the light pollution was low so i could see so many stars and satellites. while watching a satellite cross the sky from north to south i noticed a small red light zip across the sky in a zig-zag pattern.  it took it about a second and a half to go from the north all the way across my field of view straight over my head and to the south.  to put the speed in perspective it was like pointing a red laser pointer at the ceiling and zig-zag it across the ceiling.  at first i thought that was what it was...A laser pointed across the night sky but...I don't know how that could be because there were no clouds last night for a laser pointer to project on.  now this happened very quickly and the only reason i saw it was because i was already watching the satellite coming towards me from the north. it was very close to a second and a half for it to go all the way across my night sky directly over my head and vanish to the south.  so i looked back to find my satellite and it was just starting to go over my head.  right behind the satellite was a v-shaped configuration of lights one red light in front and two white lights on tip of it's wings. (<)  the lights were not strobing or blinking which was very unusual to me as everything passing this way is usually aircraft beginning their trip from charlotte douglas itnl airport.  the triangle passed the satellite and kept going south, never blinking.  as i was watching the triangle from behind me i could hear the blades of a helicopter coming from the north, same direction the red light and the triangle came from.  the copter seemed to be very high in the sky because the sound was kinda muffled and the blinking red and white lights on it looked like small lights.  i mean the lights were small and the sound was muffled which led me to believe it was very high.  i was shocked about this sighting.  nothing about it "felt" normal to me.

i have to add that this is the second sighting i've had here in lancaster of the red, zig-zagging light.  i saw the very same thing back in 2006 and thought it was odd.  it also made it's way across the sky in less than two seconds.  i reported it too i believe. this is also the third night this week i've heard a helicopter outside.

hope this helps someone.  i'm kinda stunned.

g
content.summary: Red light at high altitude, "zig-zagging" across the sky very fast.  followed by a triangle alignment of light moving very slow in the same direction.

content.detailedDescription:
Here are the notes i jotted shortly after the sighting...

(note: on submitting this form an error kept occurring. had to change the time to get it to go. someone needs to check this form, thanks)

12:04 to 12:06 am the morning of monday, 11/9/2009.  my wife and i were driving home from a late sunday night movie at park meadows. she noticed a bright flickering light in the sky out her side of the car and got my attention.  i glanced up then parked along the road fairly quickly. it was moving very slowly away from us, first at an elevation of roughly 45 degrees, and a distance from us of perhaps a couple thousand feet, although distance was very hard to judge. about 2 minutes later it disappeared by fading out abruptly. it seemed like it disappeared into the cloud layer, at something like 15 to 20 degrees elevation, and at a greater distance from us off to the east.

we first saw it as we were rounding the curve on e. county line road heading east and then curving to the north just before it intersects with e. otero ave.  this is near centennial airport. you can see the spot where where we first saw it on google earth at 39d 34m 1.27s n and 104d 49m 38.47s w. i pulled over at the point where the road widens to create a right-turn lane for turning east onto otero. i got out and quickly took a video clip on my cell phone.  couldn't tell if that video worked, and will check it out tomorrow.  we got back in car, turned onto otero going east, then stopped again within 100 feet or so of the intersection. we watched it move away from us just a little to the right of straight out our front window. looking on google maps, it appeared to be moving pretty much due east during the two minutes of the sighting.

all we could see in the dark sky was a bright, flickering strobe light, almost sparkling in appearance. the pulses of light were very quick, perhaps 5 or 6 quick flashes followed with a short pause, several flashes per second. either the object was moving around a bit, or there was more than one strobe light on the source, as the light point was jiggling around in location as it was flickering. i carefully compared its location and movement with lighting on the horizon, and am convinced the motion was more than misperception due to autokinesis.

no other lights could be seen, just the brilliant almost bluish-white strobing light or lights. it started out close enough to us that i feel certain any conventional aircraft's lights should have been visible.

weather was very calm with little or no detectable wind at ground level. no stars could be seen as it appeared there was a layer of clouds. the sky was very dark.

we got a good bearing at the point it disappeared, as it was directly above a red light on a water tower or tank east and slightly south of our location just around the corner on otero, where i stopped the car a second time. this tank can be seen on google maps, satellite view at 39d 33m 58.29s n and 104d 49m 1.78s w

just minutes before the sighting, as we drove past the south end of the runway area of centennial airport, i had noticed strobing lights near ground level marking that end of the runway approach. not sure if they flash all the time or only when there's traffic. i did notice them flashing tonight. we didn't notice any other air traffic that we can remember.

on a side note, we've twice recently noticed aircraft on landing approach into centennial having their bright landing light cycle on and off at a frequency of something like once per second. the strobing light tonight was entirely different. the landing lights would smoothly light up and dim down rythmically due to the filament bulb rise and fall time. the strobing light tonight was composed of extremely short brilliant flashes in an irregular pattern resulting in a bright flickering effect.  i mention those landing lights because my wife and i have talked about them in the last few days, as we do watch the centennial traffic quite often and notice when anything is unique. we suspect the landing lights are explainable, but neither of us have ever seen anything like the flickering strobes we saw tonight.

i do have a theory, and perhaps someone can check this out and get back to me, as a quick check on the internet didn't provide me with any good answers. since the sighting was at 12:04 am, a balloon launched from near centennial airport at exactly midnight is something to check into. as i understand it, though, weather balloons are launched at midnight greenwhich time, but perhaps this was some other type of research balloon. were the lower level winds below the cloud layer generally easterly at that time and location? are their balloons with strobe lights being launched by anyone? can a launch be verified for this date, time, and location?  did anyone else report this sighting?  thanks for any answers you might be able to provide.
content.summary: Strobing bright white flickering light in night sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Sometime after 7 o'clock friday night my husband and i were driving in a rural lake area, having dropped off one of the kids for an event, enjoying the beautiful weather while we had some time to kill.  we had stopped the car and moved around a couple times admiring the night sky since it was dark (no city lights) and flat and we were able to get great views of the stars. 

we were both commenting that it had been a long time since we'd seen so much of the night sky, since we don't often find ourselves in the country at night.  we were also talking about how many airplanes we were able to see.  i commented that i don't see many shooting stars these days (didn't see any that night either) and this experience made me want to bring out a blanket and lay on my back staring at the stars.

we decided to leave to head back to town and were just driving over the dam of the lake (i was driving) when we both saw at the same time out my window (would have been ne), a huge glowing orange light not far over the horizon.  my window was down at the time.  my husband said, "what's that?" and i said, "it's way too big to be a planet." but it was red, like venus.

we were creeping along in the car looking at it when i decided to stop.  just as i was shutting the car down, it disappeared.  my husband said that he observed it turn blue right before it disappeared, but i did not observe that as i was distracted with putting the car in gear and shutting it off. i only viewed the tail end of its disappearance.  we never saw it move in the sky, just remain still then disappear.

we both got out of the car at that point and continued to observe the sky for about 20 minutes, going back to the same spot to see if the mysterious bright light would return, but it did not.
content.summary: Huge orange light, turned blue and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I'd had terrible dreams during the night.The kind of dreams where upon awakeningyou are so sad and scared til you realize 'oh,thank god,it's only a dream!'
i dreamt i saw a cat outside my cabin balcony window.Weird.I thougt to let it in and felt something nudge me. scene changes and i see three ugly dogs.And i'm looking for the cat in three dark doorways. i only find a bloodless cat's leg. i'm so horrified. then i'm back on the ship but it's heading into a cave system of three dark openings we are sailing into.I'm surrounded by a blackness and i awaken.
i sit up in bed and look outside through the sliding glass door i see three dots of starry-light in a triangular formation rise up from below and right angle turn and float towards the bow. 'what the h is that?' i say aloud. i rush out onto the balcony but see nothing. i think, could it have been a trick of the light on the glass, but where from we were in the middle of the ocean en route to charleston ,sc from norfolk, va.Perhaps an oceanic anomaly. what is strange to me is the series of threes that were in the dream.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Seen from  cruise ship crown princess starboard side after  awakening from vivid nightmares

content.detailedDescription:
Twice a week i travel this same specific route to a friend's house, every sunday and tuesday.  ever since my first sighting on february 10th on this route (an extraordinary experience where i passed within 100 feet of a saucer shaped ufo's base) i have began to consciously watch the sky for anomalies that aren't of human make.  earlier tonight i was traveling north on the inner loop of i-485.  the weather was crystal clear.  at this hour on this specific highway an individual can spot several planes making their decent into charlotte douglas international airport.  this night was no exception.  shortly after i made my way off the ramp that connects i-85 north to i-485 north i spotted about half a dozen lights on the early night sky, all of which i assumed to be man-made airplanes.

as i approached the first set of lights that i had assumed to be a plane i noticed that it wasn't actually moving, it was just sitting in the sky above the trees well off to the right of the highway, hovering.  the lights were a triangle pattern, with a bright white light on each corner and 2 dimmer white lights on what looked like the two leading sides.  there was also a dim red light in the middle sort of off-center on the object.  when i noticed the peculiar immobility of the object my eyes became fixed on it and i started to slow down.  the object seemed to be moving extremely slowly, i'd guess less than 10 or 20 miles per hour.  there were clearly no blinking lights on the object that most all man-made planes have.  i pulled over and got out of my car for a better look and to possibly snap a picture with my phone but within seconds it seemed to change the direction that it was drifting in and it descended out of view.

night had fallen and i could not make out much more than lights and a triangle shadow above the lights, yet the fact that it was clearly not moving like a plane should leaves no doubt in my mind that this object was not human made.

after i had gotten back into my car to continue my trip i called a friend who did some sketches for me of my first sighting.  within a minute or two of calling him i had passed under what was clearly man made planes or helicopters traveling toward the direction of my sighting (although that direction was still the correct direction to travel to reach the international airport.).  the dark sky hid the true nature of these crafts, yet i heard the muffled buzz of an engine or propellers.  what was peculiar about these crafts was the fact that they were black and had minimal lighting.  they were also moving much slower than  typical plane which led me to believe they were helicopters.  they also seemed to be t the relative same height as the low hovering triangle was, if not a bit higher in altitude.

this is my second sighting this year and both have happened within a few miles from each other.  i have read that these things are attracted to power plants.  the mcguire nuclear station is just minutes from both of these sightings and may or may not have anything to do with these sightings.
content.summary: Dark triangle with 6 distinct lights on the base

content.detailedDescription: I was driving back to my home with a friend after seeing a movie. it was pitch black and there were no lights on the country roads. as we drove through an open area, we saw a huge round object with colored lights to the right of the road. we thought it was probably some type of warning lights for aircraft. the lights were above the tree line. as were driving past the lights, the object started to move slowly over us and to the left of the car. there was no noise. all we could see was the huge circle with red, green and white lights. it was very dark outside and we couldn't see anything beyond the shape of the object. it moved slowly away from us - my friend wanted to stop. i wanted to get right out of there. i was freaked out and didn't care to find out where it was going.
content.summary: Huge round object, with colored lights

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on kettle moriane drive 1/8 mi north of west bend wi. i glanced up at the half moon in the clear sky which centered in the upper wind shield when i noticed an unusual object moving west to east approaching the road i was driving on. it was approx twice the size of a twin prop plane, triangle shape (the bright half moon revealed the outline), with a luminous light at each rounded point. all three lights were pointed directly downward with the forward one being faded orange in color and the two rear lights being white. i pulled over and turned off the radio and opened the window to put my head out to get a better unobstructed view. the object made no sound as it traveled at approx 80 to 100 mi per hour at approx 800 ft alt. the entire sighting lasted 5 min until i lost sight of it beyond some trees. we have a local airport not far away and anything at this altitude should be comming from or going to it, but when i turned sw onto hihway d 2 min later it had bypassed the airport to the north headed east toward port washington and lake michigan.
content.summary: Triangle shaped object traveling from west to east at aprox 80 to 100 mi hr at aprox 800 to 1000 ft altitude

content.detailedDescription: From highway 99 going southbound at 6:20 p.M. i could see some objects about 1 mile away or slightly less.  they all had varying lights, all had a bright blue to them, then other colors as well.  they all seem to fly back and fourth in a loop.  they were next to mistlin park in ripon, ca.  i drove right under them.  1 appeared to mostly stay stationary, the others hovered in little circles and loops.  all had strange colored blue lights some had red and white as well.  one of the objects came right above the parking lot i was in, i rolled my window down and there was no noise from a propulsion system.  they appeared to only be about 50 to 100 feet in the air, but it could be more.  they almost looked like radio controlled, but there was nobody around that seemed to be flying them, and there was no noise like a radio controlled object was there. one went over my car, and it was like a cross shape lights going straight about 5 of them blue then two behind the third one down then another single one and then five where wings could be and there was a silloette like a plane sorta.I don't know what i saw but it was definately strange.  i watched it them for about 20 mins, so did a few other people, then i had to leave.  i am still puzzled as to what the heck they were.  i don't know of any objects that fly with no sound that appeared to be the size of a basketball(probably in actuality bigger) and have bright blue round almost solar/led type lighting on them.  i was only able to get a 20 second video of it with my phone.
content.summary: 4 objects in sky in ripon, ca.

content.detailedDescription: It was red and shaped like your tipical u.F.O it seemed to have sparkes flying from it.  i was walking down the lane way at my house we had recently washed all our pathes.  i stopped to admire the mountan called mt.Wellington then suddenly a bright light came accross the sky. it seemed to be on fire or crashing my first immpression was that it was space junk burning up in the atmosphere. but if that were the case it would have dissapated up in the outer atmosphere. and it was moving quite fast flares were comming of it then it went behind the mountan. i had been felling fine all day before and after.
content.summary: I saw a flash then it came into focus it seemed to be burning up or crashing.

content.detailedDescription: I was turning right into the parking lot of 429 s evergreen ave when i just happened to look up and noticed two airplanes in the air over the building to the west.  i then noticed the white light moving in an intercept course with the lower plane.  at first i thought that the object was a star before i realized it was moving.  i thought it was strange that they looked to be so close, much less going to intersect.  the plane was moving in a straight westernly direction and as the white light almost touched it, the white light seemed to accelerate and make a hook shaped maneuver away from the plane.  the white light was still moving when i lost sight of the plane and white light as they were blocked from view by the building.  i parked my car and got out, looking back in the direction that they were, but i could no longer see the plane or the white light.
content.summary: Single small white light

content.detailedDescription:
Friday about 7:10pm cst i was driving north west on hwy 114 in between southlake and westlake, being a clear evening you could see a lot of air traffic moving in and out of dfw controlled airspace when two strange crafts struck me and not belonging in the airspace, the first being a massive military aircraft, the second being a strange yellowish light.
when i first looked up i saw what i first thought to be a "shooting star" with this massive aircraft circling the airspace where the shooting star was descending at.   
the strange light in the southern sky that at first appeared to resemble one single shooting star with a small tail on it entering the earth���s atmosphere. then i noticed the object start slowing its descent, then the object "deployed" i watched as the light split into four separate lights each with their own small tail on them, that began to perform their own flight maneuvers. i pulled over to the side of the road near westlake parkway, from that advantage point it appeared that the first light i saw had stopped descending and was hovering as the three other objects descended in a spiraling pattern. at this time i also saw "other lights" suddenly pop on around the first light that was appearing to be stationary in the sky. at one point i counted up to six of these strange yellowish lights in the sky. the entire time there was a strange military craft circling the area.
i picked up my iphone to try and make a call but i the phone had no signal (very odd!) i drove down the road to trophy lake dr. and pulled into the shopping center parking lot where i was able to make a phone call. i got out of my car and could still see some of the lights but was not in a very good vantage point. however i was able to get a better look at the strange military craft, it flew directly over the blockbuster parking lot i was at. as it flew maybe 2000-3000 feet over my head i could make out the sounds of four big prop driven engines. i did not see any maker���s or insignia���s on the aircraft, however, this massive aircraft also had four big lights on it (two on each wing), that made the aircraft very easy to spot in the sky as it held its very tight bank around these strange lights. this sighting lasted maybe five minutes afterwards i returned to my trip home.
content.summary: i saw what i first thought to be a "shooting star" with this massive military aircraft circling the airspace where the shooting star was descending at.

content.detailedDescription: Bought a new digital camera (slr) to photograph what we have photographed in the past and was taking pictures of aircraft in the area and zoomed in on a commercial aircraft to see a glowing orb in the path of the jet and then later next to it and then later in the commtrails.  so i took several pictures approximately four and the camera auto focused and i lost the object.  approximately 10 minutes later i saw the glowing orb and took a couple photos of it heading in a different direction and approximately 5 minutes later 3 military f-16 jets flew overhead on the same flight path as the commercial jetliner.
content.summary: Glowing orb in front of commercial jet

content.detailedDescription:
I was awakened & knew to go to my back picture window.  (i was awakened by a voice asking me to come o the window.)  there was a stationary vortex looking glowing white mist light in my backyard.  i went to the back door, opened it & continued to look at it.  i felt peaceful and calm.  i thought it was a spirit, as i had been experiencing spirit visits 4 days in a row prior to this event.  (i had been hellping spirits cross over.)  it extended approx. 8-10 feet from ground to top, though it didn't touch the ground; it appeared to float.  i said my st. michael prayer & watched it.  it slowly faded away like a fog leaving after it rolls in.  it then was gone.  my chocolate lab was barking.  this had happened 2 days prior also.

the next day i went out to look and there were no marks on my grass--as if nothing was there.  about a week later my dad said, "deborah, i saw something last night in the yard."  he told me he saw a white light as a mist in the same spot i saw the light.  i told him what it looked like at the same time he was telling me.  he said, "wait, you saw it?"  i said, "i've seen it twice a week ago."
content.summary: Awoke to see round misty light just off ground, disappeared after 5-10 min.

content.detailedDescription:
I had justed finished work and stopped to talk with a co worker when i noticed this brilliant light traveling at a high rate of speed. not as fast as, say a shooting star but more like a military jet fighter. it was almost a blinding white light and i watched it as it traveled across the sky at a steady speed when it started to slow down and then went vertical and turned bright red and increased to a phenomenal speed and went straight to the stars where it disappeared. the sky was clear and visability was almost perfect. there was no other traffic in the sky in the vacinity of the craft. the shape appeared oval with points of light jutting from the nose and tail and sides of the craft. a total of 4 points. it's trajectory was unwavering, no side to side or up and down manuvers. i watched it for a good two minutes as it crossed clear sky and then when it turned straight up and disappeared in a matter of 2 to 3 seconds.

the person that was with me witnessed the whole episode but would rather remain silent on the matted and seemed pretty shakin up by the event. if he changes his mind about making a report i will addhis statement to this report. my vehicle was parked too far away to retrieve a camera so i just watch and mentally recored what i was seeing.

i am a chief investigator for mufon. id# 11555
content.summary: Bright starlike object altitute approx. 30000 ft. moving ne speed of a military jet. object slowed to about 2/3 it's traveled speed and then went vertical and the white light turned red and it climbed to the stars where it disappeared into infinity.

content.detailedDescription: I was working in my yard today and i have always been a "sky watcher" so to speak but i have only witnessed one strange object in my life until today. i was looking up and i noticed in the northern sky there were at least (4) chemtrails (i guess is what you would call them) running across and parallel with one another. one of them was extrvemly thick and not as long as the others. while i was observing them, i notced (2) other jets in the sky. one was travling in a direction not even close to the trails (and was not leaving any sign of a trail) and the other was travling southeast across the trails or above them. (hard to tell really) the reason i say that is because when this jet reached the thick chemtrail i lost sight of it until it went thru it or over it or whatever. this jet was not leaving any sign of a trail either and it was also much lower altitude than the other one. i could hear the engines on this one and see it very clear since it was fairly low altitude. it wasnt so low per say as it were coming in or taking off (not that low) but just "cruizing" at what i would call a normal low altitude from what i have personally see in jet planes. then i noticed another jet traveling in another direction close to the chemtrails but not leaving one itself. the chemtrails were made before any of these planes were sighted but i didnt see what made the trails. i never thought anything was really "out of the ordinary" so to speak until i looke toward the south and then i noticed there was what appeared to be a large star when a halo of sorts encircling it moving northeast very slowly at a very low altitude. now this craft was flying at an altitude i would compare to a "cessna" or maybe an "ultralite" aircraft. it never behaved eratic or anything but proceeded in a straight line northeast and never made any sound what so ever. it never blinked or there were no other lights near it. i have never seen any planes or helicopters fly that low and not make a sound at all. it flew right over my house and i observed it for at least 2-minutes or slightly longer. i have never reported anything like this before and have only experienced one other strange sighting in my life which actually was stranger than this but that was back in 1996. i hope someone can investigate this because i do not think that this was a normal craft. please let me know if anyone else saw this or can explain it. i didnt have time to get my camera or binoculars or anything so i have no photos but i know what i saw. i watched the craft until it dissapered over the trees in mu yard and i could no longer see it. please keep my personal info private. thank you........Randall k. herron
content.summary: Bright yellow star-like with a faint "halo" as such around it slowing moving,low altitude, no noise at all.

content.detailedDescription: Walked outside of my house at the time above and saw what looked to be an airplanes headlights coming over my house from the south.  i continued to watch until it was over my house and going by towards the north.  i expected to see the lights on the ends of the wings as it went by thinking they were being obstructed by the headlights of the plane as it was coming towards me.  it went over head making no noise and stayed bright, as it went by the light slowly dimmed out until it was gone. i would put the height as about the average altitude of a plane once it is under its flying altitude after take off.  i live very close to martins state airport and am very familiar with the types of planes and normal flying lanes.  this object adhered to nothing of i have seen in the skies around here before.  i am also a backyard astronomist and am able to make objective decisions about objects i see in the sky.
content.summary: Bright sphere

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside having a smoke and noticed something shiny out of the corner of my eye. when i looked i immediately realized that it was not an airplane, the light from the sun setting was reflecting so brightly it appeared golden in color. i ran in the house and grabbed the camera, i managed to get off one shot. fortunately it turned out relatively good considering the object was several thousand feet away and traveling about twice the speed of a passenger plane. the object was about twice the size of a passenger airplane also, and it made absolutely no noise as it flew almost right over my house. the object looked very similar to a bird but did not appear to moving mechanically. it was traveling in an almost straight line away from the air force base in kingwood wv.

if further investigation is required, please call the phone # given so that i may approve over the phone.
content.summary: Large bird like object moving @ high speed

content.detailedDescription: While on break at work a something caught my eye.  i saw a metallic white object moving at high speed at a high altitude moving north to south.  thought it was a commercial jet but it made no sound and i saw no shadows or protrusions indicating wings.  also seemed to increase in speed.  very clear skied and still daylight.  moved from horizon to horizon in 20 seconds or less
content.summary: Metallic white clyinder at high altitude moving at high speed no sound

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 8:30 pm on nov. 5, 2009.  our neighbor had just come over to talk to my mom and her wife about the bike ride they went on that day, and i stepped outside for a cigarette.  my usual smoking area is on the back porch and i regularly observe the sky when out there (making me quite familiar with the night sky in my area).  

  while looking towards the east, i noticed a white strobing sphere in the sky, about 30' above horizon and at a far distance.  the sphere was about twice the size of venus and the luminosity was greater than that of polaris.  this is a common area to spot commercial airlines flying towards the bay area, but the light i saw was strobing way too fast to be the lights on a plane or helicopter (the skies were pretty clear too).  there also weren't any red or blue lights like you find on the starboard and port side of an airliner, nor did i hear the sound of a helicopter or plane.

  this strobing sphere flew at a high rate of speed from the east to the west, passing in front of me at about a 70' angle at the closest.  i quickly yelled for my mother to come out and look to make sure i wasn't hallucinating (i knew i wasn't, but needed someone else to see what i saw).  she came out and spotted the object as well.

  the object continued at a high speed to the west for a little bit longer, it didn't appear to fly over the hills between tracy and livermore.  the object then began traveling nnw.  now, i say "began traveling" because there was no visible turn made.  it was like if you move the mouse cursor to the left steadily, then immediately shift to moving it to nearly the middle of the top of your screen.  a conventional aircraft would have a visible curve in their trajectory when making that kind of an angle change, but this didn't.  two conventional airliners flew into the viewable sky and i was able to point out to my mother the significant speed and altitude differences.

  after that, my mother went inside and i continued to watch the object fly off to the nnw.  it faded away from view when it got too far.  at first, i tried to convince myself it was some kind of satellite, but i later realized satellites don't make turns like that.  now, i don't know what i saw, but i'm sure it wasn't conventional aircraft or a satellite.

  during and after the observation, i would have to say i've been excited.  i've seen enough evidence from others to know that extraterrestrials exist and have wanted to spot an actual ufo for quite some time.  i knew the first steps were to watch the night sky, so i have been for some time.  i'm happy to have finally seen something i can't explain.
content.summary: Strobing white sphere at high altitude flying at high speed

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving south on us-220 approximately five miles north of rockingham when i saw, to the south-south-east, three lights, which i thought were on some unusual plane for a split second.  the lights, as you can see in the illustration i have provided, were arranged triangularly with two white lights forming the points at the base of the triangular formation and a red light at the point.

i call it the "point" because of the orientation of the object.  the red light was pointed in the direction it was traveling.

this object was moving impossibly fast.  

it appeared to be at some distance and was moving in the sky more quickly than anything man-made i've ever seen.  i would compare the speed to that of a "shooting star"/meteorite burning through the atmosphere.

after several seconds of acceleration from west to east, in a fashion comparable to how the delorean of back to the future fame would speed up before disappearing, the object sped up and then -- nothing.

it completely disappeared from the sky.
content.summary: A stable formation of three lights (2x white, 1x red, at point) moving fast and disappearing suddenly.
